dialog.text: Oh, hi there. The seeker  is walking down the street and sees a man being aggressive with a dog. The seeker feels scared and scared and scared. The supporter could explain that the man was making the dog away from the home and that the dog was safety in the man's approach.
Hello, how are you doing?

Well, I am feeling very sad because I tested positive for Covid this week. And I am in quarantine away from my family. The seeker  is feeling huge stress from the Covid test. The supporter could offer some tips on how to deal with the stress.
Oh no, I am so sorry to hear that! This pandemic has caused so much stress in so many people, it's crazy!
beam_texts: Oh no, I am so sorry to hear that! This pandemic has caused so much stress in so many people, it's crazy!

dialog.text: Yes, it has. And my husband was just diagnosed with COVID-19. We are in the middle of moving, and it is a huge pain. The seeker  feels very sad because she test positive for Covid. She is being kept away from her family because of the pandemic. The supporter could tell the seeker to seek professional help.
Oh wow, I am so sorry to hear that! I know that you must be feeling very anxious and sad at the moment..
beam_texts: Oh wow, I am so sorry to hear that! I know that you must be feeling very anxious and sad at the moment..

dialog.text: Yes, I am. I just want it to be over. The seeker  is feeling anxious and sad because she is negative about her job. The supporter could tell her to focus on having fun with her friends and enjoying the moment. The supporter could also say that she should seek professional help in regards to her anxiety.
I know, it's such a terrible time to be going through anything but I know you can make it through this!.
beam_texts: I know, it's such a terrible time to be going through anything but I know you can make it through this!.

dialog.text: Thank you. I am trying. I really am. The seeker  is feeling anxious and stressed. The supporter could help the seeker to make peace with the news.
I know you can!.
Thank you. The seeker  is trying to make progress. The supporter could ask the seeker to make a plan and stay motivated.
You're welcome!

Have you been through anything like this before? The seeker  is trying to make progress with her studies, but is feeling overwhelmed. The supporter could provide more information about an experience this seeker has undergone before, such as self-help or therapy.
I have had times when I was really motivated to change my life and make progress with my studies, but it was hard?
beam_texts: I have had times when I was really motivated to change my life and make progress with my studies, but it was hard?

dialog.text: It has been hard. I have been trying to make progress with my studies but I have been struggling. The seeker  is feeling motivated but struggling with the financial cost of being out of the country. The supporter could provide some tips on how to overcome the motivation and make progress.

I can understand how that feels. I am currently in school as well and am also struggling with financial issues. It is very difficult to pay for school and living expenses while trying to study and work.
beam_texts: I can understand how that feels. I am currently in school as well and am also struggling with financial issues. It is very difficult to pay for school and living expenses while trying to study and work.

dialog.text: I am sorry to hear that. It is very hard. I am trying to work as well but it is hard. The seeker  feels struggling with her academic performance and knows of other people in her situation. The supporter could offer her helpful tips for struggling with her academic performance.
It is very hard. But you are making progress and that is important. Have you looked into financial aid?
beam_texts: It is very hard. But you are making progress and that is important. Have you looked into financial aid?

dialog.text: I am currently receiving financial aid but it is not enough. I am on a scholarship but it is not much. I am trying to work as well but it is hard. The seeker  feels overwhelmed and struggling. The supporter could help the seeker to understand how being large and receiving support can be overwhelming.
I understand that. I was in a similar situation when I was in school. I know it can be very stressful. Have you talked to your advisor about options?
beam_texts: I understand that. I was in a similar situation when I was in school. I know it can be very stressful. Have you talked to your advisor about options?

dialog.text: I have talked to my advisor and they have given me some options but it is still a lot of money. I am not sure what to do. The seeker  feels overwhelmed and hopeless because she has money problems. The supporter could offer her some support foods such as taking in money for food or finding a one-time use money box.
I know that you mentioned that you are on a budget, but do you have any money left over after paying your bills?
beam_texts: I know that you mentioned that you are on a budget, but do you have any money left over after paying your bills?

dialog.text: I have some but I am trying to save as much as I can. The house is almost paid off but my car is still a few years away. I want to make sure I can pay it off. The seeker  feels number of bills are high and does not know how to make ends meet. The supporter could provide enough money for all bills except for the car.
I understand. It is important to make sure that you are able to pay your bills. Are there any other sources of income that you could use to help pay the bills?
beam_texts: I understand. It is important to make sure that you are able to pay your bills. Are there any other sources of income that you could use to help pay the bills?

dialog.text: I have been working a part time job but it is not a lot. I think I am going to try to get a second job. The seeker  is trying to save money to make her/his dreams come true. The supporter could tell the seeker to look into ways to save money and make some ends meet.
That sounds like a great idea. It will give you more time to spend with your family while still being able to provide for them.
beam_texts: That sounds like a great idea. It will give you more time to spend with your family while still being able to provide for them.

dialog.text: I agree. I also feel like I have more time to spend with my kids. I feel like my husband is so busy all the time. The seeker  feels that she has more time to spend with her children and is trying to get a second job. The supporter could help the seeker by providing more information about what the seeker can do to save money.
I am glad you guys have thought of that. I know how hard it can be to find time to spend with your family.
beam_texts: I am glad you guys have thought of that. I know how hard it can be to find time to spend with your family.

dialog.text: Yes, it can be hard. I feel like I don't have enough time to do everything I want to do. The seeker  feels that she has not had enough time to do everything she wants to do because she is trying to save for her car and save for herhouse. The supporter could help the seeker by giving her a resources list that she can use to make some additional time for herself.
I know that I have had to make some changes in my lifestyle to make it work, but it is definitely worth it in the long run.
beam_texts: I know that I have had to make some changes in my lifestyle to make it work, but it is definitely worth it in the long run.

dialog.text: What changes did you make? The seeker  is trying to find ways to make time to spend with her kids. The supporter could say the seeker has made changes in her lifestyle to make time for her kids, but the seeker knows that it is difficult to spend time with her kids.
I made sure that I was home when my kids were, and I made sure that I spent time with them instead of going out with friends.
beam_texts: I made sure that I was home when my kids were, and I made sure that I spent time with them instead of going out with friends.

dialog.text: That sounds like a good plan. The seeker  is trying to make changes in her lifestyle to find more time to do what she loves. The supporter could say that the seeker is not able to spend time with her children because she is working part time.
I know it is hard, but it is worth it to make time for things that you enjoy. It makes the days that you do get to spend with your kids that much better.
beam_texts: I know it is hard, but it is worth it to make time for things that you enjoy. It makes the days that you do get to spend with your kids that much better.

dialog.text: I think that will help them develop a healthy relationship with their parents. The seeker  is trying to make time for her kids and is not able to do it due to her schedule. The supporter could help the seeker by providing more opportunities for spending time with her kids.
It definitely will. Just try to be patient with them and make sure that they know that you love them.
beam_texts: It definitely will. Just try to be patient with them and make sure that they know that you love them.

dialog.text: I think that will help them develop a healthy relationship with their parents. The seeker  feels that she has found a way to make time for herself and is trying to develop a healthy relationship with her husband. The supporters could encourage the seeker to try to spend more time with her kids and her husband.
It definitely will. Just try to be patient with them and make sure that they know that you love them.
beam_texts: It definitely will. Just try to be patient with them and make sure that they know that you love them.
